title: Why strong party discipline in UK?

content.question: Party discipline in Great Britain tends to be strong because

choices.label: party members of the House of Commons share common social backgrounds
it is a long-standing tradition in the House of Lords
a government’s tenure in the House of Commons relies on its ability to maintain party support
British voters see party fragmentation as a sign of weakness
local constituents always favor the party line

content.answer: a government’s tenure in the House of Commons relies on its ability to maintain party support
